attributes.action: change the age for student finance income assessment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current age for independent assessment is 25, I believe that the age should be lowered to 21 or assessed on whether or not the student lives in their own home. How are students supposed to pay rent and bills on the loans provided? Our parents cannot, in the majority, afford to subsidise us until the age of 25! please make changes now
